channel.title: Code on Placements
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Placements

item.description: Applied Materials Details Job Status Full Time (Employment only) Criteria Study Cutoff X 70% XII 70% UG 7 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 875,914 – Stocks 4000 USD (4 yrs) – PF 57,810 – Gratuity 23,172 – Target Incentive 87,591 – CTC 10,44,488 – Round 1 29/08/23 There were no coding questions, just aptitude and analytical, math and technical questions

Arista Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 7.5 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 1500000 65000 Stocks 12000 USD over 4 years 50000 (one time relocation) Bonus 200000 – CTC 18.5 L + Stocks – Round 1 17/08/23 Coding Questions Distances Between Nodes: Given a list of elements, create a BST out of the list of elements, and every time a new element is added to the BST, find the distance (the number of edges between every pair of nodes in the BST) of every possible pair and print the sum.

Baxter Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 7 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 991310 – PF 47583 – Gratuity 19073 – Others 23081 – Target Variable Pay 118957 – CTC – – Round 1 25/08/23 There were multiple sections, aptitude, analytical, technical, electrical but no coding.

British Telecom Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Joining Bonus 150000 – Retention Bonus 250000 – CTC 1300000 – Total 1700000 – Round 1 - Coding Round 19/09/23 A total of 13 questions. Time - 120 min. MCQ (10) - Technical - (KMP and N-Queens TC was asked) Coding (3) - 1 SQL Coding Questions Maximum Friendship Power: There are N Cities and M Bi-Directional Roads.

Broadridge Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) - Member Technical Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 7 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – 30000 Stocks – – Medical 5LPA on top of CTC – CTC 10LPA – Round 1 15/09/23 There were 6 sections, no coding. Test was for 65 min, not timed section-wise Cognitive Ability (27) Data Structures (4) Database Concepts (3) Networking (6) OOPS Concepts (4) Operating System (3)

Cisco Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 1450000 88000 PF 87000 – Gratuity 34800 – Perf Bonus 72500 – RSU 34% y1 8.25% 2 yrs – Sign on Bonus 650000 (2 yrs) – Relocation 120833 – CTC 2473633 – Other compensation was mentioned, such as broadband reimbursement, medical and such. Round 1 - Coding Round 29/08/23

Cloudera Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X 8% XII 8% UG 8 GPA Cutoff was increased after initial registration. Compensation FTE Internship Base 1700000 – Variable Compensation 85000 – Retirals 114308 – STAR’s 500 – CTC 1899308 – Round 1 21/08/23 3 Questions: SQL (1) Coding (2) Coding Questions Find the 2nd largest value: Write an SQL statement to print the second largest value from a column, if it doesn’t exist, then print null.

Commvault Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X 75% XII 75% UG 80% Compensation FTE Internship Base 16,00,000 – Stocks 19000 USD – Joining Bonus 1,50,000 – Relocation Bonus 75000 – CTC 32.99LPA 50000 Round 1 - Coding Round 01/08/23 Two job roles were offered, QA and SDE, QA only had python as an option and SDE had an option between JAVA and CPP, I chose CPP.

CynLr Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 1200000 - 1800000 30000 Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC – – Round 1 27/08/23 There were 5 sections and we had 3 hours. Practical Physics (4) Phsyics MCQ’s Aptitude Coding (1) Behavioural Coding Questions Number of triangles: Given a 2d matrix of 1’s and 0’s, find the total number of equilateral and isosceles triangles that can be formed taking any of the 1’s to be the vertices.

Deloitte Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 6.5 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 760000 – Round 1 03/09/23 There were 4 sections: English Comprehension Aptitude Technical Coding (2) Coding Questions Matching Last Character: Given a list of words and a character to match, print the sorted position (1-index) of the word with the other words if the last letter of the word matches with the character to match.

Deutsche Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 7 GPA / 70% Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 19.63 LPA – Round 1 11/08/23 There was only one coding section with 3 questions Coding Questions Minimum length of positive sum subarray: Given an array with both negative and positive integers, for each index, find the minimum length subarray such that the sum of all elements in that subarray is positive.

Dish Networks Technology Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 7.5 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 1200000 – Variable 120000 – Benefits 91360 – CTC 1411360 25000 Round 1 30/08/23 No coding, just multiple sections of technical, aptitude, analytical.

Egnyte Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 7.5 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – 50000 Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 1400000 - 1500000 – Round 1 19/08/23 There was only one coding section with 2 questions, everyone had a combination of 2 from a pool of questions. Coding Questions Sum of total waiting time: There are N clients who have ordered N handmade items.

Eli Lilly Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 1100000 30000 Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC – – Round 1 14/09/23 There were totally 4 sections and it was 2 hours. The sections were not times, could allocate how much ever time required for any section. Reasoning (24) Programming (8) - Basically all were SQL Quantitative (23) Coding (3) - Everyone got different questions.

Epsilon Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 7 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 1200000 30000 Round 1 (TODO) 24/08/23 Coding Questions Q1 Explanation (optional). Q2 Explanation (optional).

HPE Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X 80% XII 80% UG 7 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 1750000 40000 Round 1 06/09/23 There were 4 sections: Aptitude (15) - 20 min Technical (33) - 40 min Coding(2) - 30 min (language 1) Coding(2) - 30 min (language 2) The options for languages was - cpp, c, python, java

Hyperface Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 8 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 14 LPA 30000 Stocks 3 L – Bonus 3 L – CTC ~20 L – Round 1 - Coding Round 18/08/23 There was only 1 question and we were given 2 hours. Coding Questions Chef’s Dishes: A chef wants to cook dishes, he gets one new ingredient each day, and this ingredient can be one of 5 types.

IBM Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus 150000 – CTC 1700000LPA – Round 1 10/09/23 There was only one section with 2 coding questions. Everyone got 2 questions from a pool of questions. Coding Questions New Array: Given a list of integers and a list of intervals, for each interval, inverst the sign of the numbers with the interval, At the end return how the list would like like.

Intuit Details Job status FTE + Internship (mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 8 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 20.5 LPA 50000 Bonus 2.05 L – Joining Bonus 3,50,000 – RSU vested over 3.5 years 23000 USD ~ (18,87,270 INR) – CTC 44,92,270 – Stipend: 1L pm Round 1 27/07/23 Questions Lost in Woods String parsing basically. Input 12 S_**___*_**D ‘S’ - start ‘D’ - destination * - obstacle _ - path

Kickdrum Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 10LPA – Variable 2LPA – Benefits 2LPA – Bonus 2LPA – CTC 16LPA 35000 Round 1 (TODO) 25/08/23 Coding Questions Q1 Explanation (optional). Q2 Explanation (optional).

MakeMyTrip Details Job Status 6 Months Internship + PPO Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 7 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 13L – Stocks 10L Vesting equally in 4 years – Bonus – – CTC 23L 50000 Round 1 16/09/23 There were 17 Questions to be solved in 1.5 hours MCQ (15) Coding (2) Coding Questions Telephone Lines: There are M houses and N localities, your job as a city planner is to design a plan such that atleast one house exists in a locality.

Morgan Stanley Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 8 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 29.48 LPA 87000 Round 1 17/09/23 There were 3 sections and a total of 100 min. Automata Fix (7) - 20min - (A debugging section, debug code such that it passes all test cases.) Quantitative and Logical Aptitude (10) - 20min Coding (3) - 60min Coding Questions Longest Common Prefix: Given an array of names, find the longest common prefix of all the names.

Natwest Group Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 6 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 13LPA – Round 1 - Coding Round 29/08/23 There were multiple sections, technical, aptitude, english, analytical. 2 Coding Everyone had different coding questions. Coding Questions Characters in same position: Given a string, find out the number of characters that will be in the same position once the string is reversed.

Newfold Digital Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 10LPA 50000 Bonus 1L – Anniversary Bonus (y2 & y3) 1L + 1L – CTC 13LPA – Round 1 (TODO) 23/08/23 Coding Questions Q1 Explanation (optional). Q2 Explanation (optional).

NVIDIA Details Job Status 6 Month Internship Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 8 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – 75000 Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC – – Round 1 20/09/23 3 Sections, 60 min and not timed by section. Analytical (15) Technical (12) Coding (2) Coding Questions Last Stone Weight int lastStoneWeight(vector<int>& stones) { priority_queue<int, vector<int>> q(stones.begin(), stones.end()); int s, t; while (q.size() > 1) { s = q.

Pure Storage Details Job Status FTE + Internship (Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 7GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 16 LPA (100000 Per month) 100000 pm 10% – Stocks 35000 USD – Bonus 300000 – CTC 271625 – Round 1 02/08/23 The questions were different for everyone. Two sections MCQ (11) Coding (2) Coding Questions Minimum Operations to Make the Array Alternating This but the input array was just of 0’s and 1’s

PwC Acceleration Centers Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 60%/6 GPA Cyber Security as Major or Elective Compensation FTE Internship Base – – CTC 6LPA 35000 Round 1: Cyber Recruit Boot Camp 08/08/23 There were 4 sections: Computer Fundamental MCQs (16) Cybersecurity MCQs (16) Coding Question - Easy (1) Coding Question - Novice (1) Coding Questions had a choice of C, Java and Python.

Ring Central Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X 90% XII 90% UG 7.5 Compensation FTE Internship Base 20,50,000 – CTC 24,15,000 + 4L sign up – Round 1 06/08/23 Two sections MCQ (15) Coding (2) MCQ Q1 Q2 Q3 Q4 Q5 Q6 Q7 Q8 Q9 Q10 Q11 Q12 Q13 Q14 Q15 Coding Q16 House Robber on Leetcode Q17

Sahaj Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 1200000 – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 1304677 – Round 1 24/08/23 Online test based on fundamentals - CN, OS, DBMS, OOPS. A total of 20 questions. Round 2 - Building in-memory DB for backend server. Problem statement We need a system to be able to manage data for employees.

Sandvine Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 7.5 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 1250000 60000 Stocks 62500 – Bonus 100000 – Benefits 225410 – CTC 1637910 – Full Time: Training Cost Recovery of Rs.2,00,000 if candidate leaves in one year of time Internship: Training Cost Recovery of Rs. 1,00,000 if candidate leaves in 6 months’ time Round 1 - Coding Round 22/08/23

Schneider Electric Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 12LPA/12.5LPA 35000 Round 1 28/08/23 No coding, MCQ’s based on aptitude, analytical, electronics, technical.

Societe Generalte Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X 60% XII 60% UG 6 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 1221255 – Round 1 06/09/23 Coding Questions Number of Pairs: Given a string of characters, find the total number of pairs that can be formed of the same character. Ex: aaaaabb can have 2 pairs of a and 1 pair of b.

Sprinklr Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 6 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 12LPA 40000 Round 1 02/09/23 MCQ (72) - Technical, Aptitude Coding (2) Coding Questions Smallest Common Substring: Given two strings, find the number of mappings of the common substrings between the two stirngs. Don’t have to consider subtrings, since they’re asking for smallest, it just becomes the individual characters.

Swym Details Job Status (Internship + Full Time Employment Mandatory) Criteria None mentiond Compensation Associate Software Engineer FTE Internship Gross 15 L – CTC 20 L – Customer Experience Engineer FTE Internship Gross 10 L – CTC 14 L – Round 1 09/08/23 First round was conducted in 4 batches for Associate Software Engineer, Customer Experience Engineer was on 10/08/23. Each batch had different questions, some did repeat though. There were 4 sections.

Tesco Details Job Status Full Time (Employment only) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 8 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 16,50,000 – Joining Bonus 3,50,000 – 98,111(retrials) – CTC 20,98,111 – Round 1 10/08/23 Had 3 sections Aptitude MCQ (25) - 30 min MCQ (10) - 20 min Coding (2) - 40 min Coding Questions Don’t print rows containing -1: Given a square 2D array of integers, don’t print rows that contain -1 Index at which it becomes greater: Given N and P, form a circle of all the primes under N (including) and start from 2 and keep adding values in clockwise manner till the sum becomes greater than P, return the index at which the sum crosses P.

Thorogood Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X 75% XII 75% UG 7.5 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base – – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC 1415400 35000 Round 1 16/09/23 3 Sections, no coding Communication Section Aptitude (5) About Thorogood

Truminds Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X 80% XII 80% UG 8 GPA 45 People with 9+ were shortlisted Compensation FTE Internship Base 600000 – Stocks – – Bonus 500000 – CTC 1100000LPA 20000 Bonus Joining Bonus - 1,00,000 Retention Bonus - 4,00,000 Round 1 - Coding Round 10/09/23 18 MCQs and 1 coding. Questions were different for everyone. Coding Questions String selection: Given N strings where each string is given in the form of an array int of size 26, where the h’th element in the string array denotes the count of #h character of lowercase English alphabets in the string.

Urban Company Details Job status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 8 GPA Compensation FTE Internship Base 16,00,000 50000 ESOP vested across 4 years 8,00,000 – Joining Bonus 3,00,000 – Retention Bonus 3,00,000 – OA 31/07/23 Questions Black and White tree: Given a tree with N vertices labeled 1-N rooted at 1. The tree is an undirected graph with N-1 edges. Each edge i connects two vertices ai and bi.

Volvo Details Job Status Full Time (Employment + Internship Mandatory) Criteria Study Cutoff X % XII % UG 6.5 GPA No Backlogs Compensation FTE Internship Base 7.5LPA – Stocks – – Bonus – – CTC – – Round 1 (TODO) 26/08/23 Coding Questions Q1 Explanation (optional). Q2 Explanation (optional).
